src:
House damaged by fire in Fort Myers Friday morning
01 Nov 2019, 13:23 by WFTX Digital Team



FORT MYERS, Fla. -- Investigators are working to figure out what led up to a house fire in Fort Myers Friday.
It happened on Veronica Shoemaker Boulevard and Brookhill Drive.
You can see damage to the home and especially the carport.
There’s no word on any injuries.
Stick with Fox 4 for any updates.
